Cosmetics giant Coty Inc. is doubling down on its investment in the Kardashian-Jenner clan. Shares of the Big Apple company jumped by more than 14 percent in early trading on Monday after announced plans to sink $200 million into a 20-percent stake in Kim Kardashianâ€™s four-year-old KKW makeup brand. The deal calls for Coty to develop new products with Kardashian.
